channel.title: How to solve all problems
channel.description:
Remove all worlds but world 2, upload every other world, allow people to download.
Remove all these horrible plugins, use the following:
http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/sec-mech-lwc-v4-1-1-lightweight-protection-for-chests-furnaces-dispensers-and-more-1-2.967/
http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/sec-admn-coreprotect-v1-33-fast-efficient-block-logging-rollbacks-1-2-5-r1.64297/
http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/sec-xauth-v2-0-3-offline-mode-authentication-1-1-r8-1-2-5-r1-0.8712/
Don't say it's unstable either, I've been hosting a server with those plugins on for some IRC channels for a while now and I haven't came across one single issue.
Turn PVP off Mobs on
Every problem solved! I just left one of these 8 month waits now we're back in again. If you want others to admire your structures on W1 then download the map and host a server.

item.title: How to solve all problems
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

There is a slight problem with the new griefer detection, it doesn’t allow you to exclude blocks in the configuration, you have to instead exclude them in the rollback command. This will allow griefers to dupe diamond, iron, gold and other blocks again if they catch on and you guys aren’t careful.

Read full topic

item.description:

It will be up in the near future.

I guess all there is to do is put it up without the previous logs, if there are very severe cases of griefing, I can look through hawkeye manually and try to solve it.

i dont think theres been any real, if any at all, griefing in the past day or 2

item.title: How to solve all problems
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:9, topic:439177”][quote author=Tom_BETA link=topic=541878.msg3974724#msg3974724 date=1334518595]

It has nothing to do with how fast we update

How so?
[/quote]

Because we have plugins we have to wait for regardless.

Anyhow, I don’t know what to do about hawkeye. I can change versions, but there is no ‘importer’ so all the hawkeye data will be lost. (so if someone griefed you an hour ago, you can’t roll it back).

Any suggestions?[/quote]

what about that other logging plugin you mentioned, was it logblock or something?

Read full topic

item.title: How to solve all problems
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:8, topic:439177”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=541878.msg3974722#msg3974722 date=1334518442]
It has nothing to do with how fast we update
[/quote]

How so?[/quote]

Because we have plugins we have to wait for regardless.

Anyhow, I don’t know what to do about hawkeye. I can change versions, but there is no ‘importer’ so all the hawkeye data will be lost. (so if someone griefed you an hour ago, you can’t roll it back).

Any suggestions?

Read full topic

item.title: How to solve all problems
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

It has nothing to do with how fast we update, the only thing that would speed it up is if we went 100% vanilla, but then we couldn’t even use xAuth.

Read full topic

item.title: How to solve all problems
item.dc:creator: @Tarkoff Tarkoff
item.description:
@Tarkoff wrote:

I agree with this. If it means having an updated server on a regular basis.
We might loose 3-5 players that would be mad, but would gain way more in the long run.
If W1 goes you might want to expaned W2 is my only note.

Read full topic

item.title: How to solve all problems
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

To put it simply, we’re too generous. If one person plays W1 with his friend(s) in comparison to our entire playerbase in W2 we immediately dismiss the interests of the large proportion of the server for so few. I do believe in a voice and fairness for everyone but I don’t believe in this over generous system of ‘We can meet everyones needs’.

When we clearly can’t. And never could.

Moparisthebest:

I don’t see how this would solve any problems, we still have to wait for a bukkit recommended download, and, for example, LWC still hasn’t been updated to the latest version.

Well it works, I’m running LWC on a 1.2.5 server right now.

http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/craftbukkit-1-2-5-r1-0-is-now-available.68742/

Experimenting with it can’t hurt, can it?

Phaze One:

Towards the original post, I am personally against the removal of PVP. As a survival game it gives a fun addition to the challenge presented with having to gather your own resources and such. Although our current player base isn’t massive the return of teams and factions could come in the future update to 1.2.5, causing the fun aspect of PVP to come back

It isn’t worth it, I can ensure you on that, leaving PVP on is going to create nothing but trouble. I speak from lots of experience when I say that. Not to be rude either, but I’ve seen you PVP once and you were unarmed?

The true essence of PVP is the cause of how borked W1 is today, activities aren’t sustainable on so little non pvp related plugins.

I’d also like to look at the addition of this, currently it’s just me and Davidi2 who actively use #moparcraft I think this would be a nice integrated feature to have:

http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/chat-minecraftbot-v2-0-1-a-basic-simple-irc-integration-plugin-1-2-5-r1-0.65448/

Read full topic

item.title: How to solve all problems
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

I still use w1 so yes it would cause problems

Read full topic

item.title: How to solve all problems
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Moparisthebest:

About that ‘coreprotect’ thing, that could be a good alternative to hawkeye, should we switch yet again?

I would agree yes. Since the update from 1.8.1>1.1 hawk seems to not record a large portion of block damage at times (not all the time). Although if it eventually updates the bugs may resolve.

Towards the original post, I am personally against the removal of PVP. As a survival game it gives a fun addition to the challenge presented with having to gather your own resources and such. Although our current player base isn’t massive the return of teams and factions could come in the future update to 1.2.5, causing the fun aspect of PVP to come back

In regards to worlds I believe that there should only be a single survival world and a single creative world. To stretch the current dwindling player count that enjoy the survival aspect of the game over two relatively large worlds separates everyone and secludes each other making the fun of multiplayer slightly redundant. Keeping the creative world would separate those who solely wish to build from the others

Read full topic

@Tom wrote:

Remove all worlds but world 2, upload every other world, allow people to download.

Remove all these horrible plugins, use the following:

http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/sec-mech-lwc-v4-1-1-lightweight-protection-for-chests-furnaces-dispensers-and-more-1-2.967/

http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/sec-xauth-v2-0-3-offline-mode-authentication-1-1-r8-1-2-5-r1-0.8712/

Don’t say it’s unstable either, I’ve been hosting a server with those plugins on for some IRC channels for a while now and I haven’t came across one single issue.

Turn PVP off
Mobs on

Every problem solved! I just left one of these 8 month waits now we’re back in again. If you want others to admire your structures on W1 then download the map and host a server.
